name: Ballpoint Universe: Infinite
overview: Ballpoint Universe is a shoot-em-up adventure featuring artwork entirely drawn in ballpoint pen. Explore immaculate worlds, discover the secrets of the doodles, and customize your Ink-Ship for battle! FEATURES: Fully customizable ink ship with anything from a blade to a flamethrower! Doodle towns to explore, 16 missions, and the endless Infinite Mode. Ornate ballpoint sketches come to life as a multitude of characters and enemies!
